### Ada Ichoja Ohaba

**Hi there!**  
I am a social worker and development expert with over 14 years of experience in peacebuilding, conflict transformation, and health systems strengthening.

#### Education
- **MSc in Social Work** (2022) | University of Jos, Jos, Nigeria
- **BSc in Social Work** (2008) | University of Jos, Jos, Nigeria
- **Diploma in Law (DIL)** (2005) | University of Jos, Jos, Nigeria

#### Experience
- **Executive Director** (Jan 2024 - Present) | Triple Nexus Consult
  - Provided counseling services and conducted training on trauma-informed care.
  - Rendered advisory expertise and supported clients through psychological challenges.

- **Research Assistant** (Feb 2024) | International Alert
  - Conducted interviews and focus groups to understand perceptions of the police force in Mangu LGA.

- **Training Consultant** (Various Dates) | Multiple Organizations (International Alert, Oxfam Nigeria, Plateau State Peace Building Agency)
  - Trained community stakeholders on peacebuilding, conflict sensitivity, early warning, and gender-based violence.

- **Country Coordinator** (2017 - 2020) | Do-No-Harm Humanitarian Development Initiative
  - Managed programs across Nigeria, mainstreaming gender and conflict sensitivity principles.

- **Output Manager** (2014 - 2017) | Justice Development and Peace Caritas
  - Led community peace building initiatives and trained stakeholders in conflict prevention and mediation.

- **Volunteer Health Promotion Representative** (2010 - 2012) | Pro-Health International Nigeria
  - Led health promotion projects, including HIV testing and distribution of mosquito nets.
